paper_abstract: In this article, solutions to three open problems on ordered commutative monoids posed in Evans et al. (2001, Semigroup forum, 62, 249-278) [4] are presented. By an ordered monoid, we always mean a totally ordered monoid. All the problems are related to the class of ordered commutative monoids which are homomorphic images of ordered free commutative monoids.
paper_title: Solutions to Some Open Problems on Totally Ordered Monoids
